channel.title: Project Insanity Yell Help
channel.description: I have the yell command already in the game, but I have no <> codes, I realized that I can use @@ for colors, but I don't believe I can for img's, I need to get my mod crowns/donator symbol in the yell someway, without the <img=*> code. Anyone know how to do this?

item.title: Project Insanity Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:4, topic:526208”][quote author=HalcyonRSPS link=topic=644953.msg4338808#msg4338808 date=1374800728]
Could you explain the upgrading text engine? Which files would I need to modify? And the @cr*@ didn’t work.
[/quote]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/236030-new-text-engine-like-459-a.html

[quote author=Not Botting link=topic=644953.msg4338828#msg4338828 date=1374805110]

you need to upgrade your clients text engine. or try using @cr1@ and @cr2@ in the messages

[/quote]quoting someone and providing no input can be considered as spam[/quote]
Also, I use this to get Color Codes after doing that system:
http://www.mathsisfun.com/hexadecimal-decimal-colors.html (The decimal color is what you want, not hex, though I’m told hex works too)

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Yell Help
item.dc:creator: @HalcyonRSPS HalcyonRSPS
item.description:
@HalcyonRSPS wrote:

I have the yell command already in the game, but I have no <> codes, I realized that I can use @@ for colors, but I don’t believe I can for img’s, I need to get my mod crowns/donator symbol in the yell someway, without the <img=*> code. Anyone know how to do this?
